website_summaries.verdict: An award-winning facial oil that has earned a loyal customer base for producing noticeable results with natural, antioxidant-rich ingredients.
pros: Formulated with plant oils that are packed with antioxidants that improve skin's texture and tone
Eases the appearance of fine lines
Brand only uses natural ingredients and is cruelty-free
cons: This facial oil is very thick and may cause breakouts

customer_reviews.title: Great antioxidant oil for acne prone skin.
customer_reviews.text: I can't gush enough about this antioxidant oil. It smells great and absorbs well when mixed with moisturizer. It takes longer to absorb just by itself. Because of issues with acne, I use oil free moisturizer which doesn't do this trick when my skin is really dry due to acne medication. I add 4 drops with my moisturizer day and night and it helps keep my skin hydrated and smooth. My skin has a glow to it plus it seems to help with oil control since my skin isn't overproducing oil due to dryness anymore. This oil has not caused my skin to break out.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am revising my review. I liked this at first but after a couple of weeks my neck and face were terribly brokeout. And peeling. I stopped using this and it cleared up. Ok tried using it again today and already have red bumps all over face. I don’t know what’s in it that is causing this and it’s been just over the 30 day return period so I guess I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Product
customer_reviews.text: Discovered this product at a Whole Foods in Oregon while on vacation. Awesome if you have normal to dry skin. It brings life and a glow to my complexion that even high dollar products don’t. All Whole Foods don’t carry the complete line, so buy it on Amazon. Also really like the Cleanser!
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Love this Antioxidant Oil!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product in a magazine and it noted such great ingredients so I ordered it to give it a try and I am so glad I did! After I wash my face at night, I put a few drops in my hands and rub gently together and then pat on my face. My skin looks great!! It is not greasy buy gives my skin a nice subtle sheen. It is a preservative-free antioxidant oil and it has changed my skin! I use a little in the morning before applying make up and my make up looks so much better too!! I am going to try a few more Mad Hippie products!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing!!!! I have crazy dry skin and live in a harsh dry environment, but this product as truly transformed my skin! It looks healthier and feels so much better! For years I couldn't get enough moisture in my skin, and I can't say enough good things about what Mad Hippie has done for me. I would recommend this product to anyone who is looking for natural skin care options. An added bonus is this product smells delicious!
customer_reviews.author: StephC

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Bad Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love Mad Hippie products. I’ve used them for several years. Occasionally, I think I might want to try something else, but always go back to Mad Hippie. However, the mailing packaging is pretty terrible. This is exactly what I saw when I opened the box. It seems crazy to me to waste such a large box on such a small item, especially since there was no cushioning material in the otherwise empty box.
customer_reviews.author: Carsan

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I have oily, acne prone, sensitive skin and this product has really made a difference. I use it both morning and night. It's helped even my skin tone, hydrate, and balance my complexion. I've also noticed a significant reduction is new acne spots. I'll continue using this for as long as I can and this comes from someone whose always hopped from skincare product to skincare product. I've also used much more expensive products claiming to do more than this one and they don't even come close to doing what this product has done. A+
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie James

customer_reviews.title: Smells and feels great
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite facial oil. Feels and smells amazing. I used to spend 3x the amount on my old oil. Makes my skin look great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I adore this antioxidant facial oil
customer_reviews.text: My skin loves it & that's all that matters to me. I apply in the am & pm. I even tap it on after I apply my bb cream to get rid of creases. I can honestly say I've tried a ton on products in my 57 years on the planet right now this is my favorite go to skin moisturizer. It mixes with everything & makes my skin feel smooth & I feel like I look glowing. Just a beautiful addition to any skin regiment in my estimation.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've tried a facial oil I looked around and decided on Mad Hippie and am glad I did. I love it. I have seen a difference in my skin texture /hydration after a few nights. It immediately felt hydrating on my skin. I like to put it on and let it soak into my skin, letting it do it's thing, before I put my night cream on. It has a nice, pleasant, light scent. Not powerful at all. Just right. I'm going to be looking into their other products and serums. Very happy. Try it! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Diane Wheaton

customer_reviews.title: The smell is divine
customer_reviews.text: The smell divine, I was unable to use because it wasn't sealed properly and contend leaked into the bubble wrap it was securely in. I was away from home for over month because of the death of my parents and when I returned it was to late to return the item. I was looking forward to this product. I may try again in the future. Have loved all products by this company.
customer_reviews.author: donna m rote

customer_reviews.title: NOW MY FAVORITE FACIAL PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin, live in a very dry climate and I'm over 60. I cannot say enough good things about this facial oil. I use it every night and on days that I'm home without makeup. It is healing, the scent natural and subtle, and it absorbs really well (give it some time). I also use Mad Hippie exfoliating serum a few times a week. Also an amazing product, especially for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Boone

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found
customer_reviews.text: I"ve tried a few Vit C Serums - this one is by far the lightest, goes on smoothly, is not sticky and does not leave your face feeling sticky. I saw visible improvement on a large (dime sized) freckly on my neck. It's near gone!
customer_reviews.author: Donna F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect facial oil
customer_reviews.text: I continue to fall in love with everyone of their products! This facial oil is amazing! It’s a little greasy at first but it soaks into your skin and leaves a beautiful soft glow. It also moisturizers my skin perfectly and makes my fine lines look less apparent. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rose

customer_reviews.title: Best Moisturizer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with this brand and especially with this oil! It is so moisturizing without feeling oily. I found it because I was having a reaction to another product that caused my skin to burn and become extremely dry. This relieved the irritation and seemed to heal the issue I was having. I haven’t had any issues since! I recommend this as often as possible!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Very hydrating and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I love how hydrating this serum is. I use it AM & PM over the vitC serum. Perfectly hydrating without being greasy. Works well under makeup too!
customer_reviews.author: J Drouin

customer_reviews.title: moisturizing, glowy
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way! Adds moisture and glowiness to my skin. (I usually lightly apply mineral powder to my face after letting this oil sink into my skin for about 15 minutes to prevent excess shine.)
customer_reviews.author: Anna K.

customer_reviews.title: Great all-over-face oil, even sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is the best quality oil for your money. I have clear skin, but it will break out at the drop of a bad product. The blend of oils is calming and soaks in within 15-20 minutes, depending on how much you use day vs. night. Definitely remember to layer oils over your water-based products because this essentially seals it all in.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Pfirrman

customer_reviews.title: Love Mad Hippie Products!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. I could see an improvement in my skin in just a couple of days....so glad I tried it out, will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Nym Puppy

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Found the Vitamin C oil at a local discount store and already had this. It really is the perfect duo. I’m 26 and grasping the concept of prevention rather than trying to reverse. I am loving the results.
customer_reviews.author: Breanne Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great face oil!
customer_reviews.text: Love this antioxidant face oil. It smells great, kind of a light citrus scent. It feels great on, not to heavy or oily and it feels great as a base layer under my face lotion. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Manning-Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail !
customer_reviews.text: I finally found the holy grail of skin care! It’s affordable and moisturizing! Much better than many expensive and touted skin care products out there! It is odorless.Will continue to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Asro11

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: This oil is great for cystic acne prone skin, sensitive skin, and dry skin. I use it alone at night and in the am I use it under my moisturizer. Doesn’t break me out and I feel has helped prevent cysts on my chin and jaw.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Mad Hippie Antioxidant Face Oil
customer_reviews.text: I just tried the Antioxidant Facial Oil, I have been using twice a day..love makes my dry face feel smooth & soft. There is a slight scent, not overpowering, just fresh scent
customer_reviews.author: Annie Girl

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell! I have very dry skin and this has been great so far. I slather it on at night and add a few drops to my daytime lotion for perfect moisture. So far so good and I plan on trying the vit c mad hippie next. I will def buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine L.

customer_reviews.title: ... this on my surgical scars and get have healed beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my surgical scars and get have healed beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca C.

customer_reviews.title: Broken out
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this oil but no. It caused a flare up of a rash around my nose and then the oil spread it all over my face. I stopped using all products on my face and after a few weeks tried using it again, thinking it could have been something else. After weeks of working to clear my skin, it’s broken out again after using the oil a few times. I think it just has too many ingredients. I’ll go back to just using pure jojoba oil!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ) Highly recommend. A skin product to that works and doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes my skin feel young again. (I'm 60, so that's an accomplishment!) Highly recommend. A skin product to that works and doesn't cost over 100$
customer_reviews.author: sassafras queen of Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: Feels great but makes me look really oily
customer_reviews.text: Feels great but makes me look really oily. I have dry very sensitive skin but argan oil always looks shinier and greasier than it feels. I prefer unrefined rosehip seed oil which soaks in instantly and doesn't look greasy even during the day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the name and the product
customer_reviews.text: I will only use natural products, so I appreciate the high-quality ingredients in the facial oil. I have very sensitive skin and have had no adverse effects. Can it make me look twenty years younger? Nope, but it does help my skin tone and eliminates any dry areas.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Helps a dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this oil, I have a dry skin and in the winter it gets worse. It helped a lot. I am ordering the second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: SanA.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly, perfect serum!
customer_reviews.text: So nice! Easily comparable to higher end serums. Love, love this! Use it nightly under my moisturizer! This will always be my go to now that I have discovered it.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Y. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Already opened package and bottle upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this product, because of all the good reviews. However, when I received the oil, I noticed that the outer box had been torn, like it had already been opened. Then, when I looked at the bottle itself, about a third of the oil was already gone. So this oil had already been used or poured out. No telling what could be in it. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never disappoints. This helped when my skin had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Never disappoints. This helped when my skin had a big dry spell over winter time. I still use it from time to time on days when I need a bit more moisture. It's a light oil and absorbs decently.
customer_reviews.author: ng

customer_reviews.title: A 10!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! My fave has never felt so good. I use it every night after I wash my face with the mad hippie cleanser
customer_reviews.author: Nurse BA

customer_reviews.title: Best antioxident oil ever!
customer_reviews.text: There are few products that quench my skin during the winter... Mad Hippie Antioxident Facial Oil works best. My skin feels smooth and the dry area disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Sismour

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second jar of this wonderful concoction -- it's lightweight and heavily moisturizing at the same time. The scent is not special, but my sensitive skin has zero reaction to it. I've tried many different versions of facial oil and this one remains my favorite for the price.
customer_reviews.author: christine hardy

customer_reviews.title: Love Mad Hippy products!
customer_reviews.text: This serum will work very well on dry skin. I wouldn't recommend it I'm overly oily skin . So what I did is I started using it on my neck and chest area . I love every mad hippie product I've tried so far .
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Becker

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell. I can only use it at night or it leaves my face too greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't absorb; face looks dull
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this product. Even with just a couple of drops, I couldn't get it to absorb, and my face looked duller than usual. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TCM

customer_reviews.title: Lovely facial oil
customer_reviews.text: Lovely oil... absorbs quickly, not greasy. Glass bottle in a small cardboard box with rubber/plastic dropper.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This facial oil checks all the boxes for me: performs wonderfully (lightweight and hydrating), is affordable (compared to other facial oils on the market!), and is clean/non-toxic (great active ingredients and no iffy ingredients, doesn’t make me break out). And it’s on Amazon! You really can’t go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Bisson

customer_reviews.title: Mad Hippie
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love the name!!! It has really increased my desire to buy more of this stuff! It feels wonderful and I will continue to use all of this company's products.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I love it! My skin looks good and I think it has made my eyelashes longer.... I've been using this oil for 2 months and my results are great....😊
customer_reviews.author: Holly Liverar

customer_reviews.title: Mad Hippe Formula
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recomend these formula if you have dry skin that needs moisture. I bought this product in two diffrent store their mostly the same however the only difference i found on both is that they have diffrent scents but regardless it's still good and give the same result.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Best oil. EVER
customer_reviews.text: If you are first starting out with oils- this is a great one to start with. The smell is amazing and it is extremely moisturizing! I have acne prone skin and I had zero breakouts from this
customer_reviews.author: audrey buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product line
customer_reviews.text: Mad Hippie skin care is simply the best. My skin has never looked better--people ask what I use all the time. Thanks Mad Hippie!
customer_reviews.author: cindy m

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really helps with moisturizing; I use it over my moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Dodi P.

customer_reviews.title: No breakouts
customer_reviews.text: No difference seen and oil is just a little heavy but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: BV

customer_reviews.title: I love Mad Hippie
customer_reviews.text: I love all of Mad Hippie's products. This one is very moisturizing and doesn't cause any issues with my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Orman

customer_reviews.title: i really like this stuff
customer_reviews.text: i really like this stuff !! it has a nice scent to it, will be ordering more and the vit c serum
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Makes my face amazing
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this oil! It makes my face feel amazing. I use it with the face cleanser. Amazing
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not for me but maybe for you!
customer_reviews.text: I applied this every night before bed, but the next day my face was still oily. I like that it was natural but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: r.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous putting this oil on my face thinking it would break me out. It doesn't at all! Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Lynn Stroh

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: been using this for about 1 year - aboslutley love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product and you definitely see results! The price is right too. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: luanna h. wilson

customer_reviews.title: this is my second bottle. i was going to ...
customer_reviews.text: this is my second bottle. i was going to mix my own facial oil, but this had many of the oils I planned to include. I use about 4-5 drops which my skin absorbs.No oily residue. My skin is soft but not greasy, even in those areas (nose and forehead) that always got greasy with face creams.
customer_reviews.author: janice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Totally changed my skin- for the better. So hydrating! I'm obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Davis

customer_reviews.title: I broke out
customer_reviews.text: I guess I am sensitive to an ingredient in the product.
customer_reviews.author: StacyS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Makes my face happy. Helped with my redness. Highly recommend. 😊
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth mackinlay

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Just love this oil. It's wonderful and has nourished my aging skin.....
customer_reviews.author: Marty McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I seen such an improvement in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndic

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: It smells great. It’s light, but provides good moisture for the face. I don’t break out using it.
customer_reviews.author: Marleny Estevez

customer_reviews.title: I love this oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! I'm on my third bottle and will be buying more. I have extremely irritable, sensitive, easily annoyed skin, and this oil feels soothing and luxurious. I sigh with relief when I apply it because it feels healing and good for my skin. It has a light lovely fresh scent and sinks into the skin quickly. I use this as moisturizer even under make-up (giving it at least 10 minutes to sink in beforehand). I don't know if it's preventing or reversing signs of aging, but it's not irritating my skin and it's adding gorgeous plumpness and smoothness, and that's exactly what I need!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Priem

customer_reviews.title: Best oil ever
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much! My face feels so great when I use it!
customer_reviews.author: Leila Regan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, love the skin cream and use them together.
customer_reviews.author: Pols

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is WONDERFUL! I have super-sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is WONDERFUL! I have super-sensitive skin; everything triggers a rosacea flare--including tretinoin, one of the leading treatments for rosacea. Well, this oil not only hydrates, it is the perfect buffer for tretinoin. For me, it's the difference between being able to use tretinoin, and not. The only improvement would be to offer it in an airless pump.
customer_reviews.author: Botticelli

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this serum, it soaks in nicely and gives my skin a healthy glow!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: This works really well for oily, shine prone and dehydrated skin with enlarged pores. Can be used under sunscreen and make-up. I do not require an additional moisturizer after using using this oil. My skin appears plumper. It is not a miracle product but definitely well above average. 2-3 drops covers my whole face.
customer_reviews.author: SH12

customer_reviews.title: ... skin on her face and she said it works wonderfully and has helped her skin out a lot
customer_reviews.text: Bought this facial oil for my granddaughter who was having problems w/dry skin on her face and she said it works wonderfully and has helped her skin out a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Barb J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! My face sucks the oil in without leaving me all greasy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works around my eyes....
customer_reviews.text: This smells good and works okay. I can't use it on my entire face (I have very sensitive skin), so I just use it a few times a week around my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: To oily wont absorb into my skin
customer_reviews.text: Haven't been using this long but no matter how little I use this just sits on my face without absorbing into the skin.My face looks oily. Too bad because I like the bevy of ingredients but I dont think I will continue using this.I also tryed using this just at night after giving up using it during the day and besides that it stained my pillow cases it still wasn't absorbed when I woke up.I like their other products but don't think I'm gonna continue with this one.
customer_reviews.author: KTop Contributor: Cake Decorating

customer_reviews.title: Mad Hippie anitoxidant oil works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I love this antioxidant oil. I use it under a moisturizer and it makes my skin smooth and soft. It is not greasy and I do not break out from it. I highly recommend it if you are looking for a facial serum.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Arem

customer_reviews.title: Broken dropper
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but we opened it (from the plastic sealed packaging) and the dropper was broken. Super dangerous and pretty confused as to how it happened.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully silky oil that isn't oily!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this stuff. The oil isn't "oily" in the least, my skin absorbs it quickly and thirstily, it really smooths and makes my neck silky and soft. I only use it there as I worry about putting anything oily on my face, but being 40 I wanted to find something wonderful to reduce and prevent my neck from wrinkling and this does it! I've used it over a year now and I do think it works, at least a heck of a lot better than the other moisturizers and products I've purchased. Plus, over a year and on the same bottle, just about to buy my second before I get too low, so can't beat the $!
customer_reviews.author: Mickey S

customer_reviews.title: Great looking formula not so good product
customer_reviews.text: Not as smooth as I thought it would be. It's kind of sticky and it has a bit of a smell to it. And if you use it under CC cream the cc cream kind of peels off !
customer_reviews.author: AJ PV.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So unhappy with this. Oil leaked - top does not close properly.
customer_reviews.author: J7901

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It makes my skin super soft and really helps heal winterbeaten skin. I use it every night along with a vitamin c serum and put it under and on my eyes. Something unexpected- I noticed my lashes growing more. Maybe something in the oil is nourishing them :)
customer_reviews.author: Bri C

customer_reviews.title: My favorite facial oil
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I absolutely love this facial oil. I use it every night and sometimes in the morning because a lot of the oils in the mixture have natural spf properties! It smells amazing and goes on smooth and soft. I’m actually almost out so I will be purchasing again soon!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mastrobuono

customer_reviews.title: Never without it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent moisturizer for dry skin with large pores. I use a Clarisonic daily, so this oil sinks right in to my skin and has helped to loosen gunk in my pores so my pores appear smaller. My skin has a glow with this product! I’ve given it to bestie and Mom, who both adore the plumping results, even skin tone, and softness.
customer_reviews.author: Kadie Around Town

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out.
customer_reviews.text: My face is used to facial oil. When I don't use it my face is really dry but this made me break out. I don't know what it was because this doesn't feel thick after you put it on. It absorbs really nice and the smell isn't overpowering. I'm going back to my Aura Cacia deep rosehip oil. I've used it for years and never made me break out. I wanted to like this so that I can mix up my facial products.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Z

customer_reviews.title: Light and effective
customer_reviews.text: My go -to facial oil...this oil is so light and soaks right in. It's amazing how I can feel the natural actives firm and revive my skin. It also smells good and a little goes a long way, so it's a good buy...and all natural! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: LauMaur

customer_reviews.title: Loveeeee
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff...keep ordering more it's the only thing that works for me...I have pretty dry skin except for the t zone and this stuff works wonders and soaks right in...a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Leann

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for combination skin
customer_reviews.text: I've had issues with oily skin forever and finally decided to use a face oil. This one has been a total game-changer. After a year of use, even in the Summer and with exercise, my skin is far less oily and much softer. I even rub it into the edges of my beard to help keep it soft. The smell is subtle, but nice and one bottle lasts me months.
customer_reviews.author: K.B

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin feel good..
customer_reviews.text: This is helping my skin tone.. I hope it takes out the brown spots. It has lessened some of them but skin damage is hard to heal. Makes my skin feel good... I used it with the Vit C serum but this goes on first.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand and their products never disappoint. I use this as a moisturizer and never breaks my skin out or irritates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great oil for when you need a boost of additional ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great oil for when you need a boost of additional moisture!! I use it 2-3 times a week as part of my nightly oil cleansing routine. I love to apply it under my eyes especially. Smell is delightful as well!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and soaks right in
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this product! Also it only takes a few drops to moisturize my face and it sinks right in - no waiting around with a sticky face and then having to wash it off like some other oils I’ve tried. Will buy again and now looking at their other products as well - maybe eye cream?
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh

customer_reviews.title: Ever since discovering this product, all of my other ...
customer_reviews.text: Ever since discovering this product, all of my other face moisturizers are sitting lonely on the medicine cabinet shelf. This stuff is so legit—makes my skin glow and moisturizes without greasiness.
customer_reviews.author: Neghar Fonooni

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love this Oil
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this Oil. I mix it with the Mad Hippie Moisturizing Lotion or use it alone...makes your face glow and very soft! PS: I have naturally oily skin and I do not find this to be too heavy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Child Psychologist, Mom Of Two

customer_reviews.title: I love this face oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this face oil!! Been using it for about 2 years & keep reordering. Living in Texas my skin needs that boost at night to repair & I feel this does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this mixture! It is all very beneficial to skin, especially the lotus oil which I have come to greatly appreciate. It smells nice too. I recommend this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for very dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: Very good facial oil for dry skin but very oily.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great company and enjoy this product, sometimes I even skip moisturizer and just use this, especially after showers

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Massages into my skin and leaves it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Massages into my skin and leaves it soft not oily. Seems to be smoothing out fine lines. Using on my face neck and chest.

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Use it every night. Skin appears more even tone and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Suda

customer_reviews.title: I am using this on my face and on my ...
customer_reviews.text: I am using this on my face and on my hands and feet to help with eczema,, it's working really well to help to combat with the symptoms, thanks for the suggestion. Dana from Mad Hippie!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Nikoley

customer_reviews.title: I love the combination of the two products
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this for me, along with the vitamin C serum. I love the combination of the two products! And, just a small amount goes a long way. I will be ordering these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A. MacClune

customer_reviews.title: Mild Pleasant Smell & No Clogged Pores
customer_reviews.text: All oils do not have equal constituents and I love the respective properties of the oils that I do recognize. It has a most mild scent of citrus which suppose is the Sweet Orange Oil (one of the last listed ingredients in case). Wearing this to bed suits my face. It's not a dry oil so if I want to not be shiny when I leave the house, I need to plan a little ahead of time. It's not clogged the first pore of mine, but of course I do make sure my face is clean and - if layering - have clean (non-clogging) products on it before I apply this.
customer_reviews.author: Samsara
